values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_4THOFJULY_GEMS_1
values.value:
"Merchants from the Jade Sea have arrived on the shores of Westeros with abundant stores of gold!

Celebrate 4th of July with EVEN MORE GOLD! Using Gems to redeem bundles in the Store awards points towards this event.
If the purchases made with Gems contain Gold, that Gold will contribute to the progress of the separate 4th of July Celebration Event. Daily Deliveries and Rewards Passes only award points for initial gold received at the time of purchase. Rewards must be collected before the promotion ends."

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_FATHERSDAY_GEMS_1
values.value:
"Merchants from the Jade Sea have arrived on the shores of Westeros with abundant stores of gold!

Celebrate Father's Day with EVEN MORE GOLD! Using Gems to redeem bundles in the Store awards points towards this event.
If the purchases made with Gems contain Gold, that Gold will contribute to the progress of the separate Day of the Father Event. Daily Deliveries and Rewards Passes only award points for initial gold received at the time of purchase. Rewards must be collected before the promotion ends."

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_FREEDOM2_CRAFT_1
values.value:
The day Daenerys Stormborn comes to Astapor, the Unsullied do not know they will be freed. Neither do the Masters of Astapor. A dragon is a precious thing, and the masters are full with greed—they do not see their deaths coming when making their trade. The day Daenerys arrives, this one, Grey Worm, is a free man.

Craft any event gear to earn points! Liberator's Silk materials for the Chainbreaker gear set are available in other Freedom in Essos events. 
Part of the 'Freedom in Essos' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_FREEDOM2_CRAFT_2
values.value:
Unsullied do not have symbols like the Westerosi, we do not train under banners—it is the masters who decide where our loyalty must go. No longer. Now we have a symbol of our own to believe in, to fight under, and live for.

Craft any Trinket to earn points! Earn materials for the Golden Dragon Band Trinket by defeating creatures in the One True Weakness event. 
Part of the 'Freedom in Essos' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_FREEDOM2_PVE_1
values.value:
Daenerys sends Daario Naharis of the Second Sons to fight Meereen's champion. His victory does not win the city, so the Unsullied enter from the sewers and in disguise give weapons to the freed slaves. The next day, the masters feel their former slaves' anger and are left in the sun to rot—now Meereen no longer belongs to the Harpy.

Defeat Sons of the Harpy to earn points! 
Part of the 'Freedom in Essos' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_FREEDOM2_PVE_2
values.value:
Before I am taken as Unsullied, I remember nothing. After I am free, I look upon the beauty of Missandei of Naath, and I know fear. I want to live—to see her as many days as I can. I say she is my weakness, but I feel stronger for knowing her. Maybe one day, when there are no more enemies to fight, I will go with her to see the white sands and tall trees of her home.

Defeat any non-event creature on the map to earn points! While this event is active, non-event creatures drop materials for the new Golden Dragon Band trinket, which can be crafted for points in the Symbol of Liberation event. 
Part of the 'Freedom in Essos' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_FREEDOM2_PVE_RALLY_1
values.value:
Now that Meereen no longer belongs to the Masters, they send their Harpies to make chaos in the streets. They are cowards who do not show their faces, but even cowards can become brave with numbers. They believe they are strong enough to kill the Mother of Dragons, but they will learn fear again at the edge of our spears.

Defeat Mob of the Harpy to earn points! 
Part of the 'Freedom in Essos' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_FREEDOM2_TRADE_1
values.value:
The Second Sons, who Daario Naharis takes command of, fight now for Daenerys. Daario knows of a secret way into the heart of Yunkai, so he, Jorah Mormont, and I go first to open the front gates. Once the Unsullied enter, the slave-soldiers drop their spears and the Yellow City falls. The freed slaves open their arms to Daenerys, and praise her as "Mhysa", their Mother.

Braavosi Loan trophy recipes are available while this event is active. Exchange Braavosi Loan trophies in the Recipes tab of your Inventory to earn points! 
Part of the 'Freedom in Essos' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_FREEDOM2_TRADE_2
values.value:
Before Daenerys's return, Tyrion Lannister, Missandei, and I must lead Meereen. We are besieged by the fleets of Astapor and Yunkai, whose masters have retaken their cities. When Daenerys returns, she flies on Drogon, and we put an end to the master's reign once and for all. The once Slaver's Bay is renamed Bay of Dragons, to remind all that freedom was earned here. Now we go to Westeros, to teach them what it means to be made free.

Exchange Braavosi Loan trophies in the Recipes tab of your Inventory to earn points. This event's Recipes are your last chance to use Braavosi Loan trophies before they can only be exchanged for Trader's Scrip! 
Part of the 'Freedom in Essos' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_FREEDOM2_UMBRELLA_1
values.value:
As Unsullied, we are taken from our mothers, we are shown our greatest fears, and we are told to kill children to earn our shield. This one has fought many wars for the masters since. Meereen, Yunkai, Astapor, all cities of Slaver's Bay, we bleed to keep our masters rich. But today, no more. Today, we Unsullied fight for freedom.

Look for these Featured Rewards throughout the Freedom in Essos event:
* Liberator's Silk are used to craft the Chainbreaker gear set!
* Golden Dragon Band Wire are used to craft the Golden Dragon Band trinket!
* Braavosi Loan trophies can be traded for prizes in the Recipes tab of your Inventory while the Battle of Yunkai or Bay of Dragons events are active. Remember to use all your Braavosi Loan trophies before the Bay of Dragons event ends!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_KINGSGUARD2_CRAFT_2
values.value:
Among the Kingsguard of King Aerys II, few held such distinctions as Ser Barristan Selmey, named 'the Bold' for his bravery as a mystery knight in the Tourney at Blackhaven. He was knighted in his 17th year after unhorsing Ser Duncan the Tall in a tourney at King's Landing. He slew Maelys the Monstrous in single combat during the War of the Ninepenny Kings. Still, his greatest achievement was yet to come...                                                                                                                                               Craft any Trinket to earn points! Earn materials for the Grappling Hook Trinket by defeating creatures in the Ser Barristan the Bold event. 
Part of the 'Honor of the Kingsguard: Defiance of Duskendale' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_KINGSGUARD2_PVE_1
values.value:
Against the wishes of Tywin, King Aerys II made his way to Duskendale to broker an arrangement with Lord Darklyn. Yet Tywin's fears proved founded, for upon the arrival of the King's entourage, the knights of Duskendale and House Hollard fell upon them. Ser Gwayne Gaunt faught valiantly to protect his liege, but he was slain by Ser Symon Hollard, and the King was taken captive in the Dun Fort.                                                                                                                             Defeat Darklyn Bannerman to earn points! 
Part of the 'Honor of the Kingsguard: Defiance of Duskendale' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_KINGSGUARD2_PVE_2
values.value:
Tywin was eager to end the long siege of the Dun Fort and prepared to launch an assault — with or without a guarantee of the King's safety. Ser Barristan plead for one final chance to save his liege. Granted one day's time, he donned the guise of a beggar and scaled the castle walls in the dead of night...                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Defeat any non-event creature on the map to earn points! While this event is active, non-event creatures drop materials for the new Grappling Hook trinket, which can be crafted for points in the Ser Barristan the Bold event. 
Part of the the 'Honor of the Kingsguard: Defiance of Duskendale' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_KINGSGUARD2_PVE_RALLY_1
values.value:
Once inside the Dun Fort, Ser Barristan stormed the dungeon, fighting his way through the men of House Darklyn and Hollard, eventually finding King Aerys II. Even Ser Symon Hollard could not stop Ser Barristan, who slew him, thus avenging Ser Gwayne. In the chaos, Ser Barristan sent King Aerys II ahead on a horse, staying behind to buy him time, before escaping himself, while suffering an arrow wound to his chest no less.                                                                                                                                                       Defeat Darklyn Commander to earn points! 
Part of the 'Honor of the Kingsguard: Defiance of Duskendale' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_KINGSGUARD2_TRADE_1
values.value:
King Aerys II, now a prisoner of House Darklyn, has been locked deep within the dungeons of the Dun Fort. Lord Darklyn made the situation clear — if there was any sign of an attack on Duskendale, that he would kill the King. Tywin, left with no other recourse, is forced to settle into a long siege to starve out the defenders.                                                                                                                                    Braavosi Loan trophy recipes are available while this event is active. Exchange Braavosi Loan trophies in the Recipes tab of your Inventory to earn points! 
Part of the 'Honor of the Kingsguard: Defiance of Duskendale' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_KINGSGUARD2_TRADE_2
values.value:
Without the King as a hostage, the beleaguered forces of house Darklyn and Hollard had no choice but to surrender, and the Defiance of Duskendale ended . King Aerys II showed them no mercy — he brutally tortured and executed all of the surviving members of the traitorous houses. The sole survivor was a young Ser Dontos Hollard, and only then because Ser Barristan pleaded for the boy's life.                                                                                                                     Exchange Braavosi Loan trophies in the Recipes tab of your Inventory to earn points. This event's Recipes are your last chance to use Braavosi Loan trophies before they can only be exchanged for Trader's Scrip! 
Part of the 'Honor of the Kingsguard: Defiance of Duskendale' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_KINGSGUARD2_UMBRELLA_1
values.value:
Among the many battles and tales to involve the Kingsguard, few are so fabled or fresh in memory as those that participated in what would become known as The Defiance of Duskendale. The duplicity of a fading noble house in the Crownlands had to contend with the stalwart bravery of knights who gave anything to protect their liege.                                                                                                                                                                       Look for these Featured Rewards throughout the Honor of the Kingsguard: Defiance of Duskendale event:
* Kingsguard Leather are used to craft the Targaryen Kingsguard gear set!
* Grappling Hook Chain are used to craft the Grappling Hook trinket!
* Braavosi Loan trophies can be traded for prizes in the Recipes tab of your Inventory while the Siege of the Dun Fort or Mad King's Ire events are active. Remember to use all your Braavosi Loan trophies before the Mad King's Ire event ends!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MEMORIALDAY_GEMS_1
values.value:
"Merchants from the Jade Sea have arrived on the shores of Westeros with abundant stores of gold!

Celebrate Memorial Day with EVEN MORE GOLD! Using Gems to redeem bundles in the Store awards points towards this event.
If the purchases made with Gems contain Gold, that Gold will contribute to the progress of the separate Memorial Day Celebration Event. Daily Deliveries and Rewards Passes only award points for initial gold received at the time of purchase. Rewards must be collected before the promotion ends."

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_ARCGEAR_196
values.value: Prepare for the new Targaryen Kingsguard gear set!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_ARCGEAR_197
values.value: Use Kingsguard Leather to craft this storied gear!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_ARCGEAR_198
values.value: "It is a rare and precious gift to be a knight, and even more so a knight of the Kingsguard."

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_ARCGEAR_199
values.value: Rally your ranged troops in support of their lord with this chest piece!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_ARCGEAR_200
values.value: Prepare for the new Chainbreaker gear set!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_ARCGEAR_201
values.value: Use Liberator's Silk to craft this elegant gear!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_ARCGEAR_202
values.value: "Will you break the wheel with me?"

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_ARCGEAR_203
values.value: Craft this ring and let your cavalry run free!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_HEROES_152
values.value: Level up Petyr, Ellaria, Varys and Tyrion!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_HEROES_153
values.value: Level up Doran, Yara, Arya and Balon!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_HEROES_154
values.value: Level up Tyrion, Missandei, Daenerys and Varys!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_HEROES_155
values.value: Level up Syrio, Old Nan, Jon Snow and Arya!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_TRINKET_89
values.value: Claim the high ground for your ranged troops with this trinket!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_TRINKET_90
values.value: Masterfully command your cavalry troops with this trinket!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_TYM_1
values.value: Prove your worth on the field of battle!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_NYMERIA_CRAFT_1
values.value:
The Rhoynar were river-farers who once ruled the banks of the mighty Rhoyne in Essos. After more than two centuries of bloody conflict with the Valyrian Freehold, the Rhoynish city-states united in a great alliance. Only Princess Nymeria dissented, forseeing the terrible wrath of the dragonlords. Her fears came to pass when three hundred dragons rained fire from the sky...

Craft any event gear to earn points! Hardy Silks materials for the Rhoynish Voyager gear set are available in other Nymeria: Princess of Dorne events. 
Part of the 'Nymeria: Princess of Dorne' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_NYMERIA_CRAFT_2
values.value:
Nymeria's wanderings were finally at an end. She and Mors wed along with hundreds of Rhoynar and Dornishmen, uniting their peoples forevermore. In celebration, she burned her fleet and declared her new husband Prince of Dorne. Yet this bid for dominion would not go unchallenged, and so began a long war for unification.

Craft any Trinket to earn points! Earn materials for the Sextant Trinket by defeating creatures in the Nymeria's War event. 
Part of the 'Nymeria: Princess of Dorne' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_NYMERIA_HOLIDAY_GOLD_2
values.value:
Gold purchased from the Store awards points toward this event.

Daily Deliveries and Rewards Passes only award points for initial gold received at the time of purchase.

Rewards must be collected before the promotion ends.

Gold purchased from the Store awards points toward this event.

Daily Deliveries and Rewards Passes only award points for initial gold received at the time of purchase.

Rewards must be collected before the promotion ends.

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_NYMERIA_PVE_1
values.value:
Nymeria knew there was only way to survive—flee the dragonlords. She gathered what remained of her people in a ragtag fleet and escaped into the southern seas. A long and terrible voyage followed; for three years, they were ravaged by storms, disease, pirates, and slavers, until finally a new land graced the horizon.

Defeat Dragon Riders, Essos Pirates, and Scorpions to earn points! 
Part of the 'Nymeria: Princess of Dorne' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_NYMERIA_PVE_2
values.value:
Victory was not easy nor swift, but the combined might of the Rhoynar and Martells was formidable. Battle after battle, they defeated and exiled every petty king they faced, swelling the ranks of the Night's Watch with fallen rulers. Only Yorick V Yronwood, the greatest of the Dornish kings, continued to stand against them.

Defeat any non-event creature on the map to earn points! While this event is active, non-event creatures drop materials for the new Sextant trinket, which can be crafted for points in the Love and Power event. 
Part of the 'Nymeria: Princess of Dorne' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_NYMERIA_PVE_RALLY_1
values.value:
After nine years of bloodshed, Mors Martell and Yorick V Yronwood fatefully crossed spears at the Third Battle of the Boneway, and Nymeria was left a widow. Now the sole commander of the Martell armies, she did battle with her husband's slayer for two years more before she defeated him. Yronwood bent the knee, and Dorne was at last one land under one ruler.

Defeat Dornish Spearmen to earn points! 
Part of the 'Nymeria: Princess of Dorne' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_NYMERIA_TRADE_1
values.value:
Dorne—a harsh land bleached by sun and blasted by sand, where poor lords and petty kings endlessly feud over scarce resources. Most did not welcome the arrival of Nymeria's fleet. Lord Mors Martell, however, felt differently. The Rhoynar possessed a wealth of knowledge and skill, far more advanced than any he had seen... and they were led by a fierce and beautiful princess who captured his heart.

Braavosi Loan trophy recipes are available while this event is active. Exchange Braavosi Loan trophies in the Recipes tab of your Inventory to earn points! 
Part of the 'Nymeria: Princess of Dorne' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_NYMERIA_TRADE_2
values.value:
Princess Nymeria reigned over a united Dorne for nearly twenty-seven years, a peerless woman. The husbands she took acted only as counselers and consorts. The customs of the Rhoynar became the customs of the Dornish, and so she was suceeded by her oldest child, a daughter. Prince or princess matters not, and so Dorne is singular among the Seven Kingdoms to this day.

Exchange Braavosi Loan trophies in the Recipes tab of your Inventory to earn points. This event's Recipes are your last chance to use Braavosi Loan trophies before they can only be exchanged for Trader's Scrip! 
Part of the 'Nymeria: Princess of Dorne' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_NYMERIA_UMBRELLA_1
values.value:
Once a ruler of the Rhoynar, the courageous Princess Nymeria cemented her legacy by leading her people on a perilous seafaring voyage to a new land, one untouched by the shadow of the Valyrian Freehold. Landing on the shores of Westeros, she would join her forces and her hand with Lord Mors Martell’s, and together they would forge a principality—one that doesn’t shy away from a woman's rule.

Look for these Featured Rewards throughout the Nymeria: Princess of Dorne event:
* Hardy Silks are used to craft the Rhoynish Voyager gear set!
* Sextant Components are used to craft the Sextant trinket!
* Braavosi Loan trophies can be traded for prizes in the Recipes tab of your Inventory while the Landfall in Westeros or Nymeria's Legacy events are active. Remember to use all your Braavosi Loan trophies before the Nymeria's Legacy event ends!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_STANDALONE_FLASHBACK_CRAFT_7_8
values.value:
The past is written and the ink is dry, but it has much to teach those with the power to read it.

Craft any Season VII or VIII event gear to earn points! Earn materials for select gear sets by defeating creatures in the Three-Eyed Raven: Vision event, or by trading Flux in the Recipes tab of your Inventory.

Season VII Gear Sets: Ironborn Captain, Laughing Knight, Citadel Inquisitor, Fledgling Squire, Winter Survivor, Storm Lord, Iron Keyholder

Season VIII Gear Sets: Targaryen Royal, Valyrian Champion, Festival Carouser, Dragon Rider, Valyrian Bloodmage, Living Mountain, Northern Noble

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_STANDALONE_TRINFECTA1_CRAFT_1
values.value:
The weight of knowledge is a heavy burden, but someone must bear it.

Craft any Trinket to earn points! Earn materials by defeating non-event creatures in the Three-Eyed Raven: Perception I event for the following Trinket Collections:

House Arryn, House Mormont, House Targaryen, House Martell, Artifacts of Winter

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_STANDALONE_TRINFECTA4_CRAFT_1
values.value:
The weight of knowledge is a heavy burden, but someone must bear it.

Craft any Trinket to earn points! Earn materials by defeating non-event creatures in the Three-Eyed Raven: Perception III event for the following Trinket Collections:

House Baelish, Dothraki Heirlooms, House Tyrell, Conqueror's Heirlooms, Dragon Rider Artifacts

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_STANDALONE_TRINFECTA4_PVE_1
values.value:
A single well-placed strike can turn the tide of battle. Know your enemy's weakness and exploit it.

Defeat any non-event creature on the map to earn points! While this event is active, non-event creatures drop materials for trinkets, which can be crafted for points in the Three-Eyed Raven: Intuition IV event. Materials earned come from the following Trinket Collections:

House Baelish, Dothraki Heirlooms, House Tyrell, Conqueror's Heirlooms, Dragon Rider Artifacts

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESC_MKT_RETURN_TO_WESTEROS_1
values.value:
Westeros has long been a land of conquerors and fierce rulers. From the cold, harsh lands in the North to the simmering heat of Dorne. From Braavos, across the Dothraki Sea, and the newly renamed "Bay of Dragons" in Ghiscar. Valiant lords, ruthless strategists, ardent devotees, and Breakers of Chains have all shaped its history... and continue to do so still.

Will you become one, too?

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESC_TITHING_1
values.value:
Donate to your lord to vie for their favor!

*Complete Tithing Event Recipes to earn Leaderboard points.
*Earn powerful Instant Boosts for placing higher on the Leaderboard.

values.name: ACTIVITY_NAME_MTX_TYM_2
values.value: Test Your Mettle Instant Boost Pack

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_FREEDOM2_CRAFT_1
values.value: "Will you fight for me? As free men?"

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_FREEDOM2_CRAFT_2
values.value: "Grey Worm is the name this one had the day Daenerys Stormborn set him free."

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_FREEDOM2_PVE_1
values.value: "I promise you, a single day of freedom is worth more than a lifetime in chains."

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_FREEDOM2_PVE_2
values.value: "No, not death. I fear, I never again see Missandei from the Island of Naath."

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_FREEDOM2_PVE_RALLY_1
values.value: "Angry snakes lash out, makes chopping off their heads that much easier."

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_FREEDOM2_TRADE_1
values.value: "The Second Sons are yours, and so is Daario Naharis."

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_FREEDOM2_TRADE_2
values.value: "I am a soldier, not a politician. But if there is a chance for peace—a just peace—we should take it."

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_FREEDOM2_UMBRELLA_1
values.value: "No one can give you your freedom. If you want it, you must take it."

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_NYMERIA_TRADE_2
values.value: Not a kingdom, but a principality.

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_STANDALONE_FLASHBACK_CRAFT_7_8
values.value: Craft Season VII and VIII Gear!

values.name: ALCHEMY_FLUX_PRESTIGE_RECIPE_DESC
values.value: While this Flux Recipes event is active, you can trade Flux for House Prestige in the Recipes tab of your Inventory. Recipe events are temporary so trade while you can!

values.name: ALCHEMY_RECIPE_EVENT_FREEDOM2_TROPHY_GENERIC_DESC
values.value: Spend your Braavosi Loan Trophies before the event ends and this recipe disappears!

values.name: BOOKMARKS_NO_ITEMS
values.value: To bookmark a location, select a tile on the map and press the Bookmark button next to its coordinates. Bookmarks will appear here.

values.name: BOOKMARK_INFO
values.value: Bookmark this location to access it for later. You can access your bookmarks by tapping the coordinate display on the combat map.

values.name: ITEM_EVENT_TROPHY_NYMERIA_1_DESC
values.value:
Can be used in Recipes during the Nymeria: Princess of Dorne event, or converted to Trader's Scrip when the event ends. 
Part of the 'Nymeria: Princess of Dorne' Event

values.name: ITEM_MAPMARKER_UNLOCK_ARRYN_TRACK_1_DESC
values.value: Collect enough shards to unlock this Arryn March Pawn. These shards are rewarded from Test Your Mettle event.

values.name: ITEM_PERSONALGIFT_T1BONUS_FESTIVAL_CRAFT_RWD_1_BODY
values.value: Your Allegiance performed well in the Festival of the Seven event, and your liege has chosen to honor you with this Personal Gift below.                                                                                                                                                          Contents: First Place Allegiance Leader Rewards (1 L35 Gear Template)

values.name: ITEM_PERSONALGIFT_T1BONUS_FESTIVAL_CRAFT_RWD_2_BODY
values.value: Your Allegiance performed well in the Festival of the Seven event, and your liege has chosen to honor you with this Personal Gift below.                                                                                                                                                          Contents: Second Place Allegiance Leader Rewards (1 L30 Gear Template)

values.name: ITEM_PERSONALGIFT_T1BONUS_FESTIVAL_CRAFT_RWD_3_BODY
values.value: Your Allegiance performed well in the Festival of the Seven event, and your liege has chosen to honor you with this Personal Gift below.                                                                                                                                                          Contents: Third Place Allegiance Leader Rewards (1 L25 Gear Template)

values.name: MONSTER_FREEDOM2_1_DESC
values.value: A former master, face hidden by a gilded mask depicting the Harpy of Meereen, vies to restore their power. They will waste their life trying.

values.name: MONSTER_FREEDOM2_2_DESC
values.value: The Sons of the Harpy have grown bolder, their numbers rising. Bloody plots are whispered in the streets: they plan an open assault against the new order, but what will it look like?

values.name: PROPERTY_DRAGONMARCHERTROOPATTACKVSPLAYER_DESC
values.value: Increases Troop Attack when marching against another player with your dragon

values.name: PROPERTY_DRAGONMARCHERTROOPDEFENSEVSPLAYER_DESC
values.value: Increases Troop Defense when marching against another player with your dragon

values.name: PROPERTY_DRAGONMARCHERTROOPHEALTHVSPLAYER_DESC
values.value: Increases Troop Health when marching against another player with your dragon

values.name: PROPERTY_UNLOCK_MAPMARKER_ARRYN_DESCRIPTION
values.value: Collect enough shards to unlock the Arryan March Pawn! These shards can be acquired by participating in the Test Your Mettle event.

values.name: SESSIONREWARD_CSR_ES_FREEDOM2_CLAIM
values.value: Honor of the Freedom in Essos (Ready!)

values.name: SESSIONREWARD_CSR_ES_FREEDOM2_DESC
values.value: Claim up to four rewards every 24 hours from the Freedom in Essos event. The fourth reward contains a valuable Instant Boost!

values.name: SESSIONREWARD_CSR_ES_FREEDOM2_TIMER
values.value: Honor of the Freedom in Essos

values.name: SESSIONREWARD_CSR_ES_NYMERIA_DESC
values.value:
Your special event shipment for the Nymeria event can contain a variety of rewards.

You can claim up to four event shipments every 24 hours. If you claim them all, you will receive an Instant Boost!

values.name: DRIVEN_DRAGONFEEDXPBONUS_ALPHA_DESCRIPTION
values.value: Bonus to XP from Feeding your dragon
